channel.title: [PI] making a command? [PI]
channel.description: i'd like to make a command that teleports you to rockcrabs. you know the whole... ::train thing... yeah i know where to put it i just dont know how to code it :/ thanks for the help

item.title: [PI] making a command? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:2, topic:426136”]if (playerCommand.startsWith("train")) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2911, 3605, 0); }

Those aren’t the right coordinates just so you know[/quote]
you should use String::equals() or String::equalsIgnoreCase()

the reason being because startsWith will check itself for the passed in parameter string (assuming S2), for S2’s length.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] making a command? [PI]

item.description:

^
I didn’t make this post… and alot of posts I haven’t posted!
Someone has been messing with my account
